paragraphs.en: 辛賽奇的觀點是對的 空軍，在戰略上的空運中也要兩條腿走路

paragraphs.zh-tw: Bombers, fighters go over here. Special Operations Command down at Tampa.
paragraphs.en: 轟炸機，戰鬥機也要這樣走 特殊行動指揮部在坦帕市

paragraphs.zh-tw: Trigger-pullers go this way. Civil Affairs, that bastardchild, comes over here.
paragraphs.en: 步兵也要如此 民政部，那個混蛋小孩，也要到這裡來

paragraphs.zh-tw: Return to the Army. The point about the trigger-pullersand Special Operations Command.
paragraphs.en: 回到部隊中去 這是關於步兵和特別行動指揮部的

paragraphs.zh-tw: No off season, theseguys are always active. They drop in, dotheir business, disappear.
paragraphs.en: 不需要理由，這些傢伙總是很活躍 他們介入、做事情，然後消失

paragraphs.zh-tw: See me now. Don't talk about it later. I was never here.
paragraphs.en: 現在看我，以後可不要再討論這個問題了 我從沒來過這裡

paragraphs.zh-tw: The world is my playground. I want to keep trigger-pullerstrigger-happy.
paragraphs.en: 世界都是我的遊樂場 我只想讓步兵們開開心心地當地道的步兵

paragraphs.zh-tw: I want the rules to beas loose as possible. Because when the thinggets prevented in Chicago with the three million dead that perverts our politicalsystem beyond all recognition, these are the guys who are goingto kill them first.
paragraphs.en: 我想讓這些規則盡可能地變寬鬆 因為在芝加哥事情受阻了 有三百萬人都死了 這就讓我們的政治部門很受打擊 有些人要先殺掉政治部門的人

paragraphs.zh-tw: So it's better off to have themmake some mistakes along the way than to see that. Reserve component -- National Guard reservesoverwhelmingly Sys Admin.
paragraphs.en: 所以最好讓他們沿著這條路先犯點錯誤 而不是只是眼睜睜地看著 保留部分—— 國民警衛隊保留佔絕對優勢的“系統監管”力量

paragraphs.zh-tw: How are you going to getthem to work for this force? Most firemen in thiscountry do it for free. This is not about money.
paragraphs.en: 你怎樣才能讓他們為“系統監管”做事呢？ 美國的許多消防員都是免費為它做事的 這不是錢的問題

paragraphs.zh-tw: This is about being up frontwith these guys and gals. Last point, intelligence community -- the muscle and the defenseagencies go this way.
paragraphs.en: 而是要讓這些孩子們重到最前面 最後一點，情報界—— 政界和國防部都要參與

paragraphs.zh-tw: What should be the CIA, open,analytical, open source should come over here. The information you needto do this is not secret.
paragraphs.en: CIA要變的開放，去分析問題，公開資源 要參與其中 你做事所需要的信息不是秘密

paragraphs.zh-tw: It's not secret. Read that great piece in the New Yorker about how our echo boomers,19 to 25, over in Iraq taught each otherhow to do Sys Admin work, over the Internet in chat rooms.
paragraphs.en: 這不是秘密 讀一下《紐約客》上的那一頁 關於那些嬰兒潮一代的子女們，大約19到25歲的那些在伊拉克的傢伙們 是怎樣通過互聯網上的聊天室來相互學習 完成“系統監管”的工作的

paragraphs.zh-tw: They said, "Al Qaeda could be listening." They said, "Well, Jesus,they already know this stuff." Take a gift in the left hand. These are the sunglasses that don'tscare people, simple stuff.
paragraphs.en: 他們說，“基地組織應當聽聽” 他們說，“其實，主啊，他們已經都知道啦” 左手拿一個禮物 有不會嚇到別人的太陽鏡，簡單的東西

paragraphs.zh-tw: Censors and transparency,the overheads go in both directions. Thanks.
paragraphs.en: 經費不僅要用於審查工作，也要用來使工作透明化 謝謝大家
